A test of one of the designs for [Fairy Door workshop](https://talk.hackspace.ca/t/neighbourhood-small-grants-2015-fairy-doors/1825?u=funvill). I have a moderate to extreme dislike for sparkles. This is from the template created in [day 24](/day-24-elven-fairy-door)
